website_summaries.verdict: If you can't afford Bose's QuietComfort noise-canceling headphones, the attractively designed and more affordable Sony MDR-NC200Ds are worth your consideration.
pros: The Sony MDR-NC200Ds are compact noise-canceling headphones with a creative design, deep bass, and adequate noise cancellation
The headphones fold up to fit into a convenient carrying case and can still play music without the noise cancellation engaged
cons: Slight, but audible hiss with noise canceling on, and the headphones lack an integrated microphone for making calls

customer_reviews.title: Make sure that the sound quality is as good with noise cancelling on
customer_reviews.text: My original review was removed... I gave an honest one.. and why they removed I have no idea... I have a $20 pair of sony headphones that sound much better than these... which I have to believe they were defective... i played music and exactly the same level.. my old headphones sound fine... the new ones distorted with the bass. and highs were unlistenable... when i turned on the noise cancelling it sounded even more horrifying.. I returned them and i am awaiting my refund...
customer_reviews.author: Cityman

customer_reviews.title: Very good, worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: Great Noise canceling, and comfortable set. My hearing isn't very good so I can't comment on its music quality, however the noise canceling portions are on part with Bose. My only complain is that there is no auto-shutoff (or if there is, it doesn't kick in easily) and batteries last for a very short time. I typically have to change them once ever couple of days (I keep forgetting to turn it off). That is a huge bother and expense! That's on average 2 AAA Batteries a work week. Still though for the price this is an awesome headset!
customer_reviews.author: Chrobry

customer_reviews.title: on a train or car it might be fine but for a long haul flight I prefer the ...
customer_reviews.text: I own 5 different noise cancelling headsets and this is one ended up getting returned. The grip around the ears isn't strong enough to block out ambient noises, on a train or car it might be fine but for a long haul flight I prefer the headphones to completely cover my ears with a secure enough grip to block out most of the noise.
customer_reviews.author: UniqueFlips

customer_reviews.title: are these made for children or pin heads?
customer_reviews.text: they don't even shape to your head! they sit on top and are not even long enough to reach both ears. Unfortunately, they were a Christmas gift! What a joke! Not for adults heads--must be for children or pinheads!
customer_reviews.author: Gerry B. Anzalone

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding!
customer_reviews.text: Great sound quality, nice features (especially the monitor button). I was sitting on a plane listening to music -- literally could not hear the engine roar or even the flight attendant when he came by with coffee. The sound quality is really terrific -- not muddy with bass notes like so many units out today. I listen to a wide variety of music from rock to classical, and I could lose myself in layers of sound with these headphones. Add to that the noise cancellation, and you get a perfect travel aide!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: The only disappointing thing is a piece of the frame ...
customer_reviews.text: These are refurbs, and the only disappointing thing is a piece of the frame on one of the ear pieces is broken off, which I feel should have been replaced. Giving Sony the benefit of the doubt, it could have been overlooked since it's behind the shaft that attaches to the ear piece. Just needed a little more attention to detail. Other than this, they seem to be nice. I will be traveling from Tampa, FL to Honolulu, which should be a great test for these headphones, I will report back after the trip.
customer_reviews.author: M. C. Norona

customer_reviews.title: Great for long airplane rides
customer_reviews.text: Used to have another pair of these but they were sat on and broke. These are much better quality than my first oair of Sony noise canceling headphones - for one thing, it is easier to get to the button to turn the noise canceling on and off. They fold down and fit nicely into a zippered carrying case. Don't know what I would have done without them on a recent safari to Africa - between the time on the plane and retiring relatively early each night in the Serengeti, i was able to listen to music and watch programs to pass the time.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy Vest

customer_reviews.title: battery vampire
customer_reviews.text: Fairly happy but I do have a couple complaints. One is that I seem to be replacing the triple A battery every single day and it doesn't work without it and the other is that it leaks sound. .Even though I am happily canceling the noise around me I am also creating a noise nuisance myself if I want a decent level of clear surround sound. On the good side I like its portability and find it to be quite comfortable. I am enjoying them and won't return them but in the future would keep these issues in mind.
customer_reviews.author: yogakat

customer_reviews.title: Great headphones
customer_reviews.text: I travel at least once a month for work and had always debated if it was worth it to buy noise canceling headphones. After buying these I'm beating myself up for not doing so years ago. These fit really nice, work well (noise canceling on or off), and have had a good battery life (three trips 4+ hours each way and still on the original batteries).
customer_reviews.author: RES

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my use!
customer_reviews.text: I'm a student and sometimes my apartment isn't as quiet as I need it to be (i.e. the neighbors play their music loud, and the people below me have a teenage girl who likes to scream at the top of her lungs). These headphones do a wonderful job of ridding those unwanted sounds and keeping me focused. They especially do a wonderful job with the lower frequency sounds. I would totally recommend these to a friend!
customer_reviews.author: Steven

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Size
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these for my mother and she absolutely loves them. She requested a pair of noise canceling headphones and she stated that they do a great job at blocking out my teenage sister LOL. They are also a great size. Not at all as bulky as I have seen with these type of headphones.
customer_reviews.author: Cirose

customer_reviews.title: very good headphones
customer_reviews.text: For the money these are very nice. The sound quality is great and they are fairly comfortable. The noise cancelling feature is adequate, not quite as good as more expensive headphones I have tried but these are so much less expensive. As noted in several reviews I read before purchasing the controls are very difficult (almost impossible) to use while wearing them. But I haven't found much need to make adjustments once they are on. I would recommend these to anyone looking for a decent noise-canceling headphone.
customer_reviews.author: kevin sato

customer_reviews.title: Noise canceling works but hurt my ears after an hour or so.
customer_reviews.text: I just used these on combined flights of 15+ hours. Had to switch over to my Sony noise cancelling earbuds after a couple of hours. These rest on your ears unlike the Bose which cover your ears Maybe it's just me but after one movie they were bothering my outer ear. And anytime you move or put your head against something they slide around and lose the noise cancelling effect. They do have a standby switch which is handy when the flight crew makes announcements so you don't have to take the headset on and off.
customer_reviews.author: Josh Baxter

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for cubicle workers
customer_reviews.text: These headphones made my job better. By the end of the day, the sounds of the air handlers, hundreds of cell phones and conversations, copy machines, shredders, had me completely stressed out. Now, I put on the headphones, and bliss out while I work. The headphones automatically adjust for office noise and filter out all the audio distractions that intruded on my brain. I strongly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa

customer_reviews.title: Refurbished like new
customer_reviews.text: We bought two refurbished and were quite satisfied. The packaging looked original and they were sealed as if new. They performed great on a long trip hopping the pond to Europe and back. The airline adapter worked although not needed with some airlines. The first set of batteries are still in and working fine. A frugal choice unless you need to show a brand name to everybody.
customer_reviews.author: Dick Fitzwell

customer_reviews.title: noise cancelling not effective
customer_reviews.text: I travel a lot and a good set of noise cancelling headphones is essential. I was disappointed in the lack of effectiveness of these Sony NC200Ds. They are also rather tight on the ears and hurt after a while. I returned these and bought a pair of Bose QC15s, which are so, so, so much better in fit, noise cancelling and sound quality.
customer_reviews.author: HunterChase

customer_reviews.title: Good quality sound and once you figure out how to ...
customer_reviews.text: Good quality sound and once you figure out how to set the NR they work really great. I will say they work better with background rumble than with talking but if you have a combination they are sweet. We have the fan running in the window and these cut all but just a bare notice but the sound of what your listening too is great! What can I say, Mama even grabs them and she is no techy...
customer_reviews.author: A. Adams

customer_reviews.title: Marginal Noise Cancelling
customer_reviews.text: I have used other over the ear NC phones in the past including Bose and Skull Candy. These were adequate in reducing most noise, but my biggest complaint is the flat Audio reproduction and low overal volume offered without additional amplification or EQ. The Audio Technica NC phones have much better audio and louder overall sound.
customer_reviews.author: K. moon

customer_reviews.title: Good, but not great.
customer_reviews.text: I used it on a long flight from US East Coast to Spain, it significantly reduced the airplane background noise and it reproduced music quite well. But after a few hours, you start feeling the headphones pressing on your ear lobes. I guess that is OK for this price range. At half the price of a Bose set, I can't complaint. I use it at work and it does reduces the sound clutter. Overall its a good little headphone set.
customer_reviews.author: Desert Islander

customer_reviews.title: Great & Lightweight
customer_reviews.text: Used it on my long flight to England and Paris this year. Was lightweight, cancelled some airplane noise but used mostly with my IPAD I was happy with the audio quality. It also comes with an adapter for airplane use so you don't have to use those cheap ones the airlines provide. Would highly recommend. Comes in a nice case.
customer_reviews.author: Reviewer44

customer_reviews.title: Uncomfortable over time.
customer_reviews.text: These headphones do cancel noise and make in-flight movies much more enjoyable, but like others have stated, they do press on your ears and hurt after a while. I've used them on a few flights between Tokyo and Detroit wishing I had something more comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: great for the price
customer_reviews.text: I hesitated to purchase a the new price. The refurbished price of 50% made them a worthwhile purchase. These are great headphones. Compact folding design, reasonable fit, reasonable noise canceling. They allow me to escape from the random noise of hotels, airports and airplanes.
customer_reviews.author: nodamage

customer_reviews.title: I like them.
customer_reviews.text: These are the best noise canceling headphones for the price if you buy them used here on Amazon. For less than $100 you cannot do better. They are well made. Fit great. And provide adequate noise canceling. Not as good as Bose, but at 1/3 the cost.
customer_reviews.author: Mathew Meyerotto

customer_reviews.title: Should have bought this earlier!!!
customer_reviews.text: I did not know how much a difference noise cancelling headphones make when used on an airline flight. I don't feel tired anymore after taking a flight. Even when used to play music/listen to TV on the plane, the noise cancelling makes the difference of you not getting tired. If you FLY, you definitely want this!!!!!! Make sure to carry a spare battery in the case.
customer_reviews.author: Ashish Desai

customer_reviews.title: These provide virtually ZERO noise cancellation.
customer_reviews.text: Do NOT waste your money if you are expecting even 25% of the Bose noise cancellation. I wish I could return these for a full refund by I've waited too long since I purchased them. I bought these for a trip to Europe and did not test them before the trip. I was very disappointed on the plane to say the least, these are awful. Sony should be ashamed of itself for labeling them as noise cancelling.
customer_reviews.author: KevinS

customer_reviews.title: Refurbished- Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I was extremely hesitant to get these headphones, let alone refurbished ones. Much to my surprise, these headphones are great and the noise cancelling is really effective. I've had a lot of high end expensive earphones/headphones and by far paying only a 100$ for these...it is definitely a really great "steal". The sound is awesome and also has strong bass (sometimes too strong for my liking but that is why I use an EQ). I am very satisfied, especially with the fact that I had paid only 100 dollars for these.
customer_reviews.author: Nehemiah.C

customer_reviews.title: comfortable and quiet.
customer_reviews.text: The Sony MDR-NC200D Noise-Canceling headphones have exceeded my expectations! They are light weight, very comfortable to wear and are excellent at keeping airplane noise quiet. I can hear people speak but it is not bothersome as voices are muffled. They seem very well made and should last for sometime with daily use. I am really glad I own these and recommend them to everyone I know.
customer_reviews.author: G. S. Moreno

customer_reviews.title: Just Okay
customer_reviews.text: The sound is just okay with these: noticeably on the muddy side lacking crisp instrument and note definition. The noise cancelling works well when positioned just right on the ears, but when the position drifts (as will when resting your head in flight), the NS and sound quality drops like a stone. The on-ear design does get uncomfortable from the constant pressure after about an hour.
customer_reviews.author: Rod F

customer_reviews.title: Headphones Work Well
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for long distance flights. Seems to use batteries quickly so pack extra. Also the cable needs to be plugged into the head phone and what ever you are listening too. Had some issues where it was disconnected mistakenly. Seem to be decent for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Blindog

customer_reviews.title: Solid Travel Headphones
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with these headphones, especially for the price. I was looking for quality headphones to use while traveling on business, both for on the plane and while in noisy hotel rooms. The headphones fold up into a wallet-sized case that works well to protect while in transit, and although they don't have a true over-ear fit they're very comfortable and the noise-cancelling function works well. I would definitely recommend for anyone who wants a solid pair of travel headphones without wanting to pay Bose prices.
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: I'll take them on every flight from now on
customer_reviews.text: I've never owned noise-canceling headphones before, so I can't compare these to other brands, but they have made watching in-flight entertainment much more pleasant. The "monitor" button is very convenient for switching off the headphones to listen to the pilot's announcements.
customer_reviews.author: A reader

customer_reviews.title: great for portability but requires a small head
customer_reviews.text: I feel like small guys and most women will find this works well but for the bigger guys - this is just to small. the ear cups are tiny! they don't go over the ears but on them which means that if you have larger features you might not like these much
customer_reviews.author: NS

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding Headphones
customer_reviews.text: Those Sony headphones are outstanding. The noise cancelling feature works excellent. Even in a busy coffee shop you can enjoy your music blending out all the background noise. The fit is comfortable. If you are looking for high quality headphones this is your set.
customer_reviews.author: Klaus Ochs

customer_reviews.title: Alright...
customer_reviews.text: They're not great on bass, they're pretty good on the mids. The sound cancelling is good, but not great. Overall, worth the price, but don't expect too much from them. They're not the Bose headphones...
customer_reviews.author: nicreis

customer_reviews.title: battery powered noise reduction inefficient
customer_reviews.text: Noise reduction, comfort of headset are good. The AAA battery that powers the noise reduction is insufficient for use over 3 hours. Which means you need to carry spares for long plane rides. Be nice to have a recharge ability.
customer_reviews.author: customer

customer_reviews.title: Headphones
customer_reviews.text: Used these for a trip to Hawaii on the plane. By any means they do not cancel out the plane noises but ten times better than regular earphones. I could actually hear my music without it being on full blast. I would definitely recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn

customer_reviews.title: They sound great and the noise-cancelling works well
customer_reviews.text: I've had these headphones for 2 years and they have held up well. They sound great and the noise-cancelling works well. I find that the switches are hard to use while the headphones are on your head.
customer_reviews.author: MainlightPhoto

customer_reviews.title: SoundGood
customer_reviews.text: I was contemplating buying the QC15 earphones, but decided to buy these based upon price considerations and frequency of use. I fly across from New York to Asia a few times a year; these cover my ear and I don't find them hurtful when I am wearing eyeglasses. Sitting in coach they sufficiently block cabin noise and are a great addition to my audio listening comfort on the long flights. I would recommend these as a future purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Zurker

customer_reviews.title: The recipient was delighted with this gift, and speaks highly of the product
customer_reviews.text: I have no further info about this gift, so cannot add more than the above. From his comments, I must assume he uses it regularly, and is completely satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: R. B. Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: These headphones are great. I bought them to help with my fear of flying. Cancelling out the engine noise of a plane really helps me and these headphones did just that. The sounds quality through them is also really good. Only problem is that the buttons on the side are really small so I tend to have to take them off to use any of them or I don't know what I am hitting. Love the fact that even if the battery dies I can still listen to music through them. Great headphones.
customer_reviews.author: Faith Prigal

customer_reviews.title: Good product for the money
customer_reviews.text: This sony product for the money works well. The cup that fits over the ears is a little small. The head phones do not provide advance notice when the battery is getting weak. They phones do a good job of cutting the noise down while providing excellent stereo sound.
customer_reviews.author: Todd Spinner

customer_reviews.title: Good value for money
customer_reviews.text: I bought this headphones after a lot of searching on amazon. I was initially very apprehensive about the purchase, but the headphones are really worth the buy. I recently took it to India and also used it in flight. The noise cancellation is pretty good, and the cushioning on the headphones dont hurt your ears one bit. I wore it for the entire length of the flight without any discomfort. Their airplane adapter works too. Would recommend this to anyone who is looking for a noise cancelling headphone that delivers well for a decent price.
customer_reviews.author: R. Kumar

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works really well, but only with the noise cancelling on. Drains battery really quickly.
customer_reviews.author: krithi rajan

customer_reviews.title: But still a good product at this price
customer_reviews.text: I used it on my international flight. It has some effects on Noise-canceling, but it is hard to fall sleep with that. And it will make your ears hurt if you wear it too long. But still a good product at this price.
customer_reviews.author: JerryCat

customer_reviews.title: A plus for Sony!
customer_reviews.text: This unit has effective active noise cancellation via AAA battery, and seems to last over 10-12 hours continuous use. Music and audio quality is excellent, a subjective call of course, but is satisfying to use. I think it is s quality unit with excellent packaging and foldability, making for a compact package while traveling. I think it offers better value than the gold standard of noise-canceling headphones, the Bose.
customer_reviews.author: Tak

customer_reviews.title: Works without the power on
customer_reviews.text: they're great for noise reduction, but the over the ear rather than the surround the ear design makes a 6 hour flight a long one. The noise reduction is as good as my other pair of Bose QC-2 surround the ear phone. Another plus is that they will function whether the power is on or off, unlike the Bose. I thought they were a good value at $200, and I would buy them again
customer_reviews.author: daniel marier

customer_reviews.title: Great set of NC headphones
customer_reviews.text: These are awsome!!! I work in an office environment and the noise canceling feature blocks everybody out. If somebody needs they send me an email or tap me on shoulder. I don't need to hear about everybody's drama at work or home. Did I mention the sound quality is amazing too.
customer_reviews.author: Family Man

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: LIghtweight, reasonable price, excellent sound. What more can you ask for? Short of 5 stars because they're not the best I've tried with regard to noise-cancellation. It's not like being in a sound-proof booth, but for the price and size, I can't complain.
customer_reviews.author: Ernest Penfold

customer_reviews.title: Noise canceling-ish
customer_reviews.text: They are ON EAR head phones, not around ear. Keep this in mind as they are a little small. As such, they don't really cancel as much noise as you would assume.
customer_reviews.author: Apples.VS.Oranges

customer_reviews.title: Not good
customer_reviews.text: Not comfortable for long duration flights. The over the ear causes slight discomfort . I think will cough up an extra 100$ and get a Bose
customer_reviews.author: RAMBAL

customer_reviews.title: Good but not great
customer_reviews.text: This was my first experience with noise-cancelling headphones. They were comfortable for a long cross-country flight and my music sounded great. They cancelled most background noise but the over-the-ear models I tested in the Apple store cancelled more. For the price I was very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan W. Harlow, Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for airline travel
customer_reviews.text: Used these on a trip to Germany, and they were perfect on the plane. Eliminated almost all external noise. Certainly comparable with Bose and a better buy.
customer_reviews.author: S. Vandegrift

customer_reviews.title: great head phones
customer_reviews.text: Great sound quality as i always expect from Sony, base not too high. Rich clear sound loved these head phones.
customer_reviews.author: TT

customer_reviews.title: As advertised
customer_reviews.text: Great condition, very comfortable. Came with case and original booklet. Very nice fit and the sound is fantastic. I enjoy everyday.
customer_reviews.author: Simone

customer_reviews.title: Meh - hard to beat Bose
customer_reviews.text: I got these for my wife as a cheaper alternative to the Bose Quiet Comfort 3's we had borrowed to get her some relief from the craziness of a house with two toddlers. The sound quality with music was excellent. The noise-cancellation was just OK and does not compare to the Bose. Also, they tended to slip off when walking around the house, especially when bending over. We did not try them on a plane. Pros: -great sound -comfortable Cons: -ho hum noise cancellation around the house -slipped off easily
customer_reviews.author: Michael Donlin

customer_reviews.title: Peaceful quiet at last
customer_reviews.text: The headphones were bought from Amazon as a gift to my business traveling son. He told me that now his flights are blissfully quiet. He can work, read, or nap on long flights. Airplane noise, crying babies, talkative seat mates, etc. are no longer a distraction and he arrives at his destination calm and rested.
customer_reviews.author: J.  Mengel

customer_reviews.title: OK for cubicle / office use - not for noisy environments like a server room
customer_reviews.text: This headphone provides a moderate amount of noise isolation. It is okay for drowning out office din. Does not do much for server room noise (by extension airplanes / trains / buses etc.). Hence returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Muthazhagu Palanisamy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works well. But if you wear external hearing aids you might prefer an around the ear type. I have to remove my hearing aids.
customer_reviews.author: Judy McCain

customer_reviews.title: Gift
customer_reviews.text: They were both a gift - My feed back as they like them. They are lights and comfortable and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Bobby Segraves

customer_reviews.title: Nice does the job
customer_reviews.text: I have owned an older model of the Sony over the ear version, I like it better then this model. The on ear style works but I do not find as comfortable. It work to keep the noise down in the office
customer_reviews.author: MoonDawg

customer_reviews.title: Great sound and value, except that it breaks too easily...
customer_reviews.text: I pains me to write this since the noise supression and the sound were good. I once would have said that these headphones were a great value. However, that was until, during normal use, both inside swivel joints broke. The most heavily used and the most vulnerable parts of these phones, I discovered, were made merely with the thinnest of plastic bars. If that little plastic snaps (and it does very easily), the headphone pops out -- and the phones thus are unusable. For the price paid, I would have expected a much more robust, lasting product. Fool me once, shame on you. My new, replacement headphones, unfortunately, will not be these. Hence my review.
customer_reviews.author: Commuter

customer_reviews.title: Best Noice-Cancelling Headphones to Date
customer_reviews.text: Great Headphones. Noise Cancellation works great onboard planes. Frustrated at position of the noise-cancelling button. Every time I adjust the headphones, i turn off the Noise-Cancelling feature....
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: comfortable, great sound and light weight
customer_reviews.text: I like the fact that the earpads are flat. I can wear them longer than other headsets without discomfort. Noise cancelling effect is excellent. They are small and lightweight and come with a case that makes them easy to store.
customer_reviews.author: Res

customer_reviews.title: Work great! Sound great!
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to set up right out of the box. Very comfortable to wear. I would highly reccomend to everyone.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Bussard

customer_reviews.title: Regular traveller
customer_reviews.text: I bought these as a gift for my husband who travels by plane every week. He loves them, says that they work really well and are comfortable to wear.
customer_reviews.author: mrs s m byrne

customer_reviews.title: Great set of headphones!
customer_reviews.text: Noise canceling feature is not as good as Bose, but it's a great contender (especially for the price). When used to listen to music or to watch movies/tv shows on a laptop or iPad, the sound is crisp! I'm happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: BK

customer_reviews.title: Nice headphones for travel
customer_reviews.text: Noise cancelling feature works quite well. They fit a little snug on the ears but very good quality and a reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: DD

customer_reviews.title: Not clear the noise cancellation does much
customer_reviews.text: The sound deadening effect of these headphones seems to be linked largely to the insulating ear pads that prevent outside sound from coming in. That is reasonably effective but I could not discern any difference when I switch the noise cancellation feature on and off - the amount of external sound remains the same in both situations. Overall decent but not clear why one needs to pay for sound cancellation when it does not add anything to reducing ambient noise.
customer_reviews.author: HN

customer_reviews.title: don't buy if you expect noise canceling on airplanes
customer_reviews.text: Headphones fit nicely and have good sound but on airplane you still hear 50% of the background noise and the cancellation hiss from the earphones is discernible. I bought Song to save money vs. Bose but not sure I made the best decision.
customer_reviews.author: SH

customer_reviews.title: terrific sound, good price, compact design
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised at the full-bodied sound I got from these headphones. They are comfortable, compact and affordable.Having been using them for a couple of months.
customer_reviews.author: Clara Sheffer

customer_reviews.title: Good, but not great.
customer_reviews.text: Headphones are super comfortable. The noise-cancelling feature is not that strong and is easily over taken by noises. Good, but not great.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Dean Towle

customer_reviews.title: not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: the noise cancelling does not make a big difference....just put 100 more and get the Bose...really disappointed with this order
customer_reviews.author: RoseS

customer_reviews.title: Sony noise canceling ear phones
customer_reviews.text: For the price these are good noise canceling ear phones. I used them on the plane last week and it made the trip bearable. I will purchase another pair for my wife
customer_reviews.author: Byron Nesheim

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected!
customer_reviews.text: Headphones came packaged in the original box and within a week vice the advertised 10-14 days. Couldn't have asked for more and saved lots of $$$$. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Janet

customer_reviews.title: Headset too small to eliminate the background noise
customer_reviews.text: Tested by watching TV and plugging the headphones into the Stereo, the tv bleed through. Tv was set to 15 and the stereo was set to 2 Good sound from the headset
customer_reviews.author: dgslosson

customer_reviews.title: Noise canceling headphones
customer_reviews.text: not quite noise canceling as I expected expected better. not as good as bose or dr dre. but for the price they are ok
customer_reviews.author: Paul Willson

customer_reviews.title: Just as good as Bose
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable and effective at noise cancelling, wear them consistently when I travel. Sound quality is excellent, best of all, they are more affordable than Bose headphones.
customer_reviews.author: Jonezy

customer_reviews.title: NICE-NICE-NICE
customer_reviews.text: Nice-Nice-Nice, That's What They Are, Nice-Nice-Nice What They Are, Is Nice. Which Is To Day That They More Than Met My Expectations.
customer_reviews.author: Jan K. Hoskinson

customer_reviews.title: super sound
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my husband and it need to be noise-cancelling and small in size. they were perfect
customer_reviews.author: Noemi Rivera

customer_reviews.title: I love the headphones
customer_reviews.text: I love the headphones, they are comfortable and noise cancelling. We have already taken them on the plane and they worked great. I highly recommend them!
customer_reviews.author: Debbie W

customer_reviews.title: A+
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my son. He travels a lot and really enjoys these on the plane. He loves them!
customer_reviews.author: Rbridger

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product!
customer_reviews.text: thanks for all, excellent!! I got the product on perfect timing, and I love it, just as described... thanks! .
customer_reviews.author: Juan Francisco Giudici

customer_reviews.title: Totally Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I was very excited to receive these and try them out but was completely disappointed. While the sound reproduction was fine, I bought them for noise cancellation. I could barely tell the difference between when the noise cancellation was on and when it was off. I compared them with NC on to a pair of regular headphones and could not tell the difference at all. I returned them the same day they arrived.
customer_reviews.author: Pablo

customer_reviews.title: Model Replaced by new technology
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this model as it was marked as a replacement model for a previous model. I apparently did not do enough research as this model has also been replaced. Would not have purchase it had I known that.
customer_reviews.author: azle

customer_reviews.title: It was only as good as expected
customer_reviews.text: I think Coby makes one just as good. The ear cops are too small. The AI works well. But not that comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: John C

customer_reviews.title: ON ear is definitely different than AROUND ear
customer_reviews.text: My wife said at first that it hurt after an 8-hour day (she's a translator), but I'm sure she got accustomed to it or she would have thrown them away.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry

customer_reviews.title: Great sound
customer_reviews.text: These headphone sounds great but if you are sitting next to the person you can hear the music! If you are wearing them they cancel out all the noise
customer_reviews.author: Jenn

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This product is especially great for those who don't like earbuds in your ears. Very comfortable. Good noise cancellation, even blocks some background noise without using the noise cancellation feature. I conducted a great deal of online research prior to purchase. I highly recommend these headphones.
customer_reviews.author: Carol

customer_reviews.title: Noise-Canceling FAIL
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my college-age daughter. She wanted noise-canceling headphones so that she could study in her noisy apartment instead of studying at the library. These may be good for listening to music, but failed at noise-canceling. I couldn't even tell when they were turned on. I had better results putting my fingers in my ears. I bought these because they were less expensive than another well-know brand, but I had to return these and buy the other brand anyway. These did come with a nice traveling case, though.
customer_reviews.author: Averagemom

customer_reviews.title: Useless...
customer_reviews.text: Save your money. I retuned them immediately after trying them. The offer little to no sound canceling. I assure you the Bose over the ear units are worth their $$$$.
customer_reviews.author: Todd Peterson

customer_reviews.title: not for me
customer_reviews.text: They fit me funny on my head. Maybe it's me but they were really rounded and looked odd to me when on. Vanity aside and most importantly they don't cover your ears completely. I returned them and got the earlier version the Sony MDR-NC60 which I love, fits close to the head and cover the ears completely.
customer_reviews.author: Edison Carter

customer_reviews.title: Worst Product & Horrible Service from the company.  Dont buy from them.
customer_reviews.text: The product did not work very well. I would not recommend. Don't buy any products from Sonic Electronix. It was one of the worst experiences I have ever had. They dont even deserve one star. Terrible service. If you want a refund you wont get one.
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: Perfect but for one fatal flaw
customer_reviews.text: There's little else to add beyond the other reviews here: These are nice headphones, they sound great, they reduce ambient noise well, they're comfortable, they look and feel solid, and they fold up nicely in the included case. Then the right channel cuts out two weeks after the warranty expires.
customer_reviews.author: Piano Quartz

customer_reviews.title: Not newer model of MDR-NC60
customer_reviews.text: This is more of a review of Amazon than of the MDR-NC200D headphones, which I have not used and will be returning. Amazon advertises these headphones with "See a newer model of this item" alongside the listing for the Sony MDR-NC60, which are evidently discontinued. The MDR-NC200Ds are NOT a replacment for the MDR-NC60s, which are over-the-ear headphones. These are ON-the-ear headphones, which are nowhere near as effective are reducing ambient noise. You can't tell this (at least I couldn't) by looking at the pictures. I bought these because I have the MDR-NC60s, love them, and wanted an additional set. I trusted Amazon, and in this case that was a mistake. Hopefully they'll make returning them to J&R Music easy.
customer_reviews.author: UDCurmudgeon

customer_reviews.title: Sony MDR-NC200d
customer_reviews.text: Overall Nice Headphones. I use this while working and traveling Pro's: Light weight Good sound Relatively solid construction Compact Con's: It does not really work as noise cancellation. (thus 2 star reduction.) - I have had noise cancellation headphones of various brands before - each and every one did a better job canceling noises than this one. Would I recommend it to a friend? No.
customer_reviews.author: Ann Annomous
